item.description:
Manchester Community College is hosting a monthly free movie in its new facility, MCC on Main - 903 Main St. • Manchester

“Reel Sundays on Main”
Come and enjoy a free film courtesy of Manchester Community College
www.mcc.commnet.edu/mcc-on-main
Sunday, August 26th at 1–3 p.m.
"Wanderlust" - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1655460/

The facility is small; the movies are shown in a seminar room that holds about 45 people.  So please confirm your attendance!  Come early and view the artwork in the building's galleries.  There is plenty of street parking and free lots a block or two away.

 

NOTE:  We might go out afterwards to Shady Glen or some other location.  We might just stay and enjoy one of the eateries on Main Street.
item.name: FREE MOVIE - "Wanderlust"
